name: Sapsara, Appellant, v. Peoples Cab Company

judges: Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Bell, Chidsex, Musmanno and AbNOLD, JJ.
parties: Sapsara, Appellant, v. Peoples Cab Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Columbus.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Sapsara, Appellant, v. Peoples Cab Company.
Argued March 17, 1955.
Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Bell, Chidsex, Musmanno and AbNOLD, JJ.
April 18, 1955:
Clair V. Duff, with him Robert A. Doyle and Duff & Doyle, for appellant.
Borland I. Casteel, with him Chas. Holmes Wolfe, Jr. and Campbell, Houclc & Thomas, for appellee.
